author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Syneos Health Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.55
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:26 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Syneos Health Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.55 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Syneos Health Inc: * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.24
* Q1 REVENUE $1.06 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.04 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.51 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.55
* REAFFIRMING FULL YEAR 2018 ASC 605 GUIDANCE FOR ADJUSTED SERVICE REVENUE AND ADJUSTED EBITDA
* INCREASING ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE TO A RANGE BETWEEN $2.80 AND $3.07 FOR 2018
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.57, REVENUE VIEW $4.41 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
